tactic: induction p0 as [|p0'|]; induction p1 as [|p1'|]; induction p2 as [|p2'|]; induction p3 as [|p3'].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall p0 p1 p2 p3 : positive, iad_conv_aux_2 p0 p1 = iad_conv_aux_2 p2 p3 -> p0 = p2 /\ p1 = p3

Premises:
Inductive positive : Set := xI : positive -> positive | xO : positive -> positive | xH : positive For xI: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For xO: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
iad_conv_aux_2 = fix iad_conv_aux_2 (p0 p1 : positive) {struct p1} : positive := match p0 with | (p0'~1)%positive => match p1 with | (p1'~1)%positive => ((iad_conv_aux_2 p0' p1')~1~1)%positive | (p1'~0)%positive => ((iad_conv_aux_2 p0' p1')~0~1)%positive | 1%positive => ((iad_conv_aux_1 p0')~1~1)%positive end | (p0'~0)%positive => match p1 with | (p1'~1)%positive => ((iad_conv_aux_2 p0' p1')~1~0)%positive | (p1'~0)%positive => ((iad_conv_aux_2 p0' p1')~0~0)%positive | 1%positive => ((iad_conv_aux_1 p0')~1~
iad_conv_aux_img_disj : forall p0 p1 p2 : positive, iad_conv_aux_0 p0 <> iad_conv_aux_2 p1 p2 /\ iad_conv_aux_1 p0 <> iad_conv_aux_2 p1 p2
iad_conv_aux_0_2_img_disj : forall p0 p1 p2 : positive, iad_conv_aux_0 p0 <> iad_conv_aux_2 p1 p2
iad_conv_aux_1_2_img_disj : forall p0 p1 p2 : positive, iad_conv_aux_1 p0 <> iad_conv_aux_2 p1 p2
iad_conv_aux_0_inj : forall p0 p1 : positive, iad_conv_aux_0 p0 = iad_conv_aux_0 p1 -> p0 = p1
iad_conv_aux_1_inj : forall p0 p1 : positive, iad_conv_aux_1 p0 = iad_conv_aux_1 p1 -> p0 = p1
iad_conv_aux_0_1_img_disj : forall p0 p1 : positive, iad_conv_aux_0 p0 <> iad_conv_aux_1 p1
iad_conv = fun a0 a1 : ad => match a0 with | 0%N => match a1 with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_0 p1) end | N.pos p0 => match a1 with | 0%N => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_1 p0) | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_2 p0 p1) end end : ad -> ad -> ad
Pos.SqrtSpec_ind : forall P : positive * Pos.mask -> positive -> Prop, (forall s x : positive, x = (s * s)%positive -> P (s, Pos.IsNul) x) -> (forall s r x : positive, x = (s * s + r)%positive -> (r <= s~0)%positive -> P (s, Pos.IsPos r) x) -> forall (p : positive * Pos.mask) (p0 : positive), Pos.SqrtSpec p p0 -> P p p0
Pos.SqrtSpec_sind : forall P : positive * Pos.mask -> positive -> SProp, (forall s x : positive, x = (s * s)%positive -> P (s, Pos.IsNul) x) -> (forall s r x : positive, x = (s * s + r)%positive -> (r <= s~0)%positive -> P (s, Pos.IsPos r) x) -> forall (p : positive * Pos.mask) (p0 : positive), Pos.SqrtSpec p p0 -> P p p0
Pos.max_unicity_ext : forall f : positive -> positive -> positive, (forall n m : positive, (n < m)%positive /\ f n m = m \/ (m <= n)%positive /\ f n m = n) -> forall n m : positive, f n m = Pos.max n m
Pos.min_unicity_ext : forall f : positive -> positive -> positive, (forall n m : positive, (n < m)%positive /\ f n m = n \/ (m <= n)%positive /\ f n m = m) -> forall n m : positive, f n m = Pos.min n m
Pos.max_unicity : forall n m p : positive, (n < m)%positive /\ p = m \/ (m <= n)%positive /\ p = n -> p = Pos.max n m
Pos.min_unicity : forall n m p : positive, (n < m)%positive /\ p = n \/ (m <= n)%positive /\ p = m -> p = Pos.min n m
andb_prop : forall a b : bool, a && b = true -> a = true /\ b = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.exists_mem_4 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, SetoidList.compat_bool eq f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.exists_ f s = true -> {x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt | FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true /\ f x = true}
Pos.max_spec : forall n m : positive, (n < m)%positive /\ Pos.max n m = m \/ (m <= n)%positive /\ Pos.max n m = n
Pos.min_spec : forall n m : positive, (n < m)%positive /\ Pos.min n m = n \/ (m <= n)%positive /\ Pos.min n m = m
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.choose_mem_3 : forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.is_empty s = false -> {x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt | FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s = Some x /\ FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true}
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.for_all_mem_4 : forall f : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt -> bool, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> forall s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.for_all f s = false -> {x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt | FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true /\ f x = false}
Zpos_eq : forall p q : positive, p = q -> Z.pos p = Z.pos q
Pos.succ_inj : forall p q : positive, Pos.succ p = Pos.succ q -> p = q
Pos.mul_eq_1 : forall p q : positive, (p * q)%positive = 1%positive -> p = 1%positive
Pos.mul_eq_1_r : forall p q : positive, (p * q)%positive = 1%positive -> q = 1%positive
Pos.SubMaskSpec_sind : forall (p q : positive) (P : Pos.mask -> SProp), (p = q -> P Pos.IsNul) -> (forall r : positive, (q + r)%positive = p -> P (Pos.IsPos r)) -> (forall r : positive, (p + r)%positive = q -> P Pos.IsNeg) -> forall m : Pos.mask, Pos.SubMaskSpec p q m -> P m
Pos.SubMaskSpec_ind : forall (p q : positive) (P : Pos.mask -> Prop), (p = q -> P Pos.IsNul) -> (forall r : positive, (q + r)%positive = p -> P (Pos.IsPos r)) -> (forall r : positive, (p + r)%positive = q -> P Pos.IsNeg) -> forall m : Pos.mask, Pos.SubMaskSpec p q m -> P m
Pos.add_carry_reg_r : forall p q r : positive, Pos.add_carry p r = Pos.add_carry q r -> p = q
Pos.mul_reg_l : forall p q r : positive, (r * p)%positive = (r * q)%positive -> p = q
Pos.mul_reg_r : forall p q r : positive, (p * r)%positive = (q * r)%positive -> p = q
Pos.add_reg_r : forall p q r : positive, (p + r)%positive = (q + r)%positive -> p = q
Pos.add_reg_l : forall p q r : positive, (p + q)%positive = (p + r)%positive -> q = r

```coq
induction p0 as [|p0'|]; induction p1 as [|p1'|]; induction p2 as [|p2'|]; induction p3 as [|p3'].
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- iad_conv_aux_2_img_disj. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- iad_conv_aux_2_img_disj. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- iad_conv_aux_2_img_disj. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.max_unicity_ext. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.min_unicity_ext. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.max_unicity. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.min_unicity. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.max_spec. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.min_spec. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.add_carry_reg_r. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.mul_reg_l. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.mul_reg_r. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.add_reg_r. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- Pos.add_reg_l. auto.
Qed.
